text: "Ride a White Horse" is a 2006 song by British dance band Goldfrapp and is the third single from their third studio album Supernature. It went to number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Spain, number 9 in Scotland and number 36 in Ireland. In 2007 it was featured in an episode of The L Word. ==Track listings== * CD single 1 # "Ride a White Horse" (single version) – 3:46 # "Slide In" (DFA remix (edit)) – 5:24 * CD single 2 # "Ride a White Horse" (Serge Santiágo re-edit) – 8:09 # "Ride a White Horse" (FK-EK vocal version) – 7:48 # "Ride a White Horse" (FK Disco Whores dub) – 7:40 # "Ride a White Horse" (Ewan Pearson Disco Odyssey Parts 1 + 2) – 15:13 * DVD single # "Ride a White Horse" (live in London)* – 7:12 # "Supernature Tour Access All Areas" – 4:25 # "Number 1" (Múm remix) (audio) – 2:37 * US CD maxi single # "Ride a White Horse" (single version) – 3:46 # "Boys Will Be Boys" -
